alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Eastern Norfolk; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Hampden; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:40PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, eastern, northeastern and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along with a flash freeze as temperatures drop into the 20s by late Friday morning. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain and sleet between 4 and 8 am Friday. The morning commute will be impacted along with a flash freeze expected as temperatures drop into the 20s by late Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Eastern Norfolk; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Hampden; Western Norfolk
